an5.174:1.1: Atha kho anathapindiko gahapati yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam abhivadetva ekamantam nisidi. Ekamantam nisinnam kho anathapindikam gahapatim bhagava etadavoca:
an5.174:2.1: “Panca, gahapati, bhayani verani appahaya ‘dussilo’ iti vuccati, nirayanca upapajjati.
an5.174:2.4: imani kho, gahapati, panca bhayani verani appahaya ‘dussilo’ iti vuccati, nirayanca upapajjati.
an5.174:3.1: Panca, gahapati, bhayani verani pahaya ‘silava’ iti vuccati, sugatinca upapajjati.
an5.174:3.4: imani kho, gahapati, panca bhayani verani pahaya ‘silava’ iti vuccati, sugatinca upapajjati.
an5.174:4.1: Yam, gahapati, panatipati panatipatapaccaya ditthadhammikampi bhayam veram pasavati, samparayikampi bhayam veram pasavati, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti, panatipata pativirato neva ditthadhammikam bhayam veram pasavati, na samparayikam bhayam veram pasavati, na cetasikam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an5.174:4.2: Panatipata pativiratassa evam tam bhayam veram vupasantam hoti.
an5.174:8.1: Yam, gahapati, suramerayamajjapamadatthayi suramerayamajjapamadatthanapaccaya ditthadhammikampi bhayam veram pasavati, samparayikampi bhayam veram pasavati, cetasikampi dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti, suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativirato neva ditthadhammikam bhayam veram pasavati, na samparayikam bhayam veram pasavati, na cetasikam dukkham domanassam patisamvedeti.
an5.174:8.2: Suramerayamajjapamadatthana pativiratassa evam tam bhayam veram vupasantam hotiti.
